languages.text: "На этом месте наши пути расходятся, {name}. Я видел достаточно, и больше не собираюсь быть соучастником твоих преступлений. Несмотря на то, что Лорд-инквизитор великодушно согласился закрыть глаза на твои грехи, я не сомневаюсь, что нам еще предстоит встретиться в не столь благоволящих тебе обстоятельствах".

"This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."
languages.original_text: "На этом месте наши пути расходятся, {name}. Я видел достаточно, и больше не собираюсь быть соучастником твоих преступлений. Несмотря на то, что Лорд-инквизитор великодушно согласился закрыть глаза на твои грехи, я не сомневаюсь, что нам еще предстоит встретиться в не столь благоволящих тебе обстоятельствах".

traits.locale_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I've seen enough and I no longer wish to be an accomplice in your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your sins, I have no doubt that we'll meet again in circumstances you'll find less auspicious than these."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I've seen enough and I no longer wish to be an accomplice in your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your sins, I have no doubt that we'll meet again in circumstances you'll find less auspicious than these."

Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we'll meet again in circumstances you'll find less auspicious than these."

traits.locale_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “恐怕我们只能分道扬镳了，{name}。我已经看够了你犯下的罪行，我也不想再成为你的帮凶了。尽管大审判官大人慷慨地原谅了你的过失，但我非常确信，我们以后还会见面的。到了那个时候，你恐怕会发现，你届时的境遇恐怕不会像现在这么舒服。”
languages.original_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我们只能分道扬镳了，{name}。我已经看够了你犯下的罪行，我也不想再成为你的帮凶了。尽管审判长大人慷慨地原谅了你的过失，但我非常确信，我们以后还会见面的。到了那个时候，你恐怕会发现，你届时的境遇恐怕不会像现在这么舒服。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、別れの時が来た。私は色々と経験を積んできた。これ以上、共犯者にはなりたくない。ロード・インクィジターは罪を見逃してくださったが、きっとあなたは、今よりもっと悪い状況に身を置くことになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、別れの時が来た。私は色々と経験を積んできた。これ以上、共犯者にはなりたくない。ロード・インクィジターは罪を見逃してくださったが、きっとあなたは、今よりもっと悪い状況に身を置くことになるだろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Aquí es donde nos separamos, {name}. He visto suficiente y ya no deseo ser cómplice de sus crímenes. Aunque el Lord Inquisidor sea lo suficientemente generoso como para pasar por alto sus transgresiones, no me cabe duda de que volveremos a encontrarnos en circunstancias que encontrará menos favorables que estas».
languages.original_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."

traits.locale_text: «Aquí es donde nos separamos, {name}. He visto suficiente y ya no deseo ser cómplice de sus crímenes. Aunque el Lord Inquisidor sea lo suficientemente generoso como para pasar por alto sus transgresiones, no me cabe duda de que volveremos a encontrarnos en circunstancias que encontrará menos favorables que estas».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hier trennen sich unsere Wege, {name}. Ich habe genug gesehen, und ich möchte nicht länger Komplize bei Euren Verbrechen sein. Der Großinquisitor war zwar so großzügig, Eure Vergehen zu übersehen, doch ich bin überzeugt, dass wir uns unter Umständen wiedersehen werden, die Ihr weniger erfreulich finden werdet."
languages.original_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."

traits.locale_text: "Hier trennen sich unsere Wege, {name}. Ich habe genug gesehen, und ich möchte nicht länger Komplize bei Euren Verbrechen sein. Der Großinquisitor war zwar so großzügig, Eure Vergehen zu übersehen, doch ich bin überzeugt, dass wir uns unter Umständen wiedersehen werden, die Ihr weniger erfreulich finden werdet."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'est ici que nos chemins se séparent, {name}. J'en ai vu plus qu'assez et je ne souhaite plus être complice de vos crimes. Même si le seigneur inquisiteur a eu l'immense générosité de passer outre à vos transgressions, je suis certain que nos routes se croiseront de nouveau, et dans des circonstances bien moins plaisantes. »
languages.original_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ici que nos chemins se séparent, {name}. J'en ai vu plus qu'assez et je ne souhaite plus être complice de vos crimes. Même si le seigneur inquisiteur a eu l'immense générosité de passer outre à vos transgressions, je suis certain que nos routes se croiseront de nouveau, et dans des circonstances bien moins plaisantes. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, yollarımız burada ayrılıyor. Ben göreceğimi gördüm. Suçlarına daha fazla ortak olmak istemiyorum. Lord Engizisyoncu yaptıklarını görmezden gelecek kadar cömertti ama eminim daha şanssız bir gününde yine denk geliriz."
languages.original_text: "This is where we part ways, {name}. I have seen enough, and I no longer wish to be an accomplice to your crimes. Although the Lord Inquisitor was generous enough to look past your transgressions, I have no doubt that we will meet again in circumstances you will find less auspicious than these."
